name: IAI (TheoMarzona)
description:
For the GMTK Jam 2019, with the theme of 'Only One'

In Iai, there is only one goal, to cut down dozens of your enemies, in only one strike.

There is only one button, use [SPACEBAR] to attack when the enemy's number is at zero.

There is also only one screen, so don't worry about it.

Special Thanks :

Gasrux font by Hatemachine
Enter the Emperor by avgvsta
TinyWorlds and artisticdude for sound effects
